thread.title: Neanderthals were the world's first artists

title: Neanderthals were the world's first artists
text:
Neanderthals were the world's first artists 7:05pm IST - 01:33 
A new study reveals that the oldest cave art found in Europe was drawn by Neanderthals, predating modern humans by at least 20,000 years. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A new study reveals that the oldest cave art found in Europe was drawn by Neanderthals, predating modern humans by at least 20,000 years. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2CEitcV
